title: What is the status of outstanding bonds approved by the voters in NHC?  This would include date of the bond, what it was for, initial amount, current amount due and pay-off date.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/12/what-is-the-status-of-outstanding-bonds-approved-by-voters-in-new-hanover-county/
